segments.text: I see the woman standing by the sink, completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle around her feet is getting bigger, and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being so clever, taking cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar with such determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched, hoping to get a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is about to tip over, but the boy is focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems to be in her own world, not noticing the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen when she finally realizes what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window looks so calm and peaceful, unlike the interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of curiosity watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman looks up soon and sees the mess and the children's mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
